TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlStreamStore extends System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore
Public NotInheritable Class XmlStreamStore Inherits AnnotationStore
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlStreamStore extends System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore

summary.span: 表示用于写入或读取用户批注的 XML 数据存储区。

span.span: Represents an XML data store for writing and reading user annotations.
XML Markup Compatibility Specification

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `stream` 必须为有效的 XML 格式且符合 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] 架构。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Uri, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri>> knownNamespaces) cil managed
Public Sub New (stream As Stream, knownNamespaces As IDictionary(Of Uri, IList(Of Uri)))

param.name: stream
param.span: 用于读取和写入用户批注的 I/O 流。

span.span: The I/O stream for reading and writing user annotations.

param.name: knownNamespaces
param.span: 包含已知兼容命名空间列表的字典。

span.span: A dictionary with a list of known compatible namespaces.

summary.span: 使用指定 I/O 和已知兼容命名空间的字典初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O and dictionary of known compatible namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 构造函数允许注册应用程序特定的已知命名空间。This constructor enables the registration of application-specific known namespaces. `knownNamespace` 字典定义在将自定义内容作为批注的一部分存储时使用的应用程序命名空间。The `knownNamespace` dictionary defines application namespaces that are used when you store custom content as part of an annotation. 字典键是应用程序已知的主命名空间。The dictionary key is the primary namespace known to the application program. 命名空间键与较旧命名空间的值列表相关联，这些命名空间与 "key" 命名空间兼容。The namespace key is associated with a value list of older namespaces that are compatible with the "key" namespace. 加载批注时，此列表中的所有命名空间都将替换为 "key" 命名空间。When annotations are loaded all namespaces from this list will be replaced by the "key" namespace. `stream` 必须为有效的 XML 格式且符合[批注架构](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema)。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [Annotations Schema](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema).

span.span: is .
contains invalid XML.

exception.span: 字典包含重复的命名空间。

span.span: The dictionary contains a duplicate namespace.
-or-

exception.span: 字典包含具有 键的元素。

span.span: The dictionary contains an element that has a key.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.

value.span: 如果对每次操作都要立即将批注缓冲区中的数据写入物理数据存储区，则为 ；如果要在应用程序显式调用 时写入批注缓冲区中的数据，则为 。

span.span: if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri> GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces(class System.Uri name) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces (name As Uri) As IList(Of Uri)

param.name: name
param.span: 为其返回命名空间列表的起始 URI 序列。

span.span: The starting URI sequence to return the list of namespaces for.

summary.span: 返回与输入命名空间兼容的命名空间列表。

span.span: Returns a list of namespaces that are compatible as an input namespace.

returns.span: 与 匹配的兼容命名空间的列表；如果找不到任何兼容命名空间，则为 。

span.span: A list of compatible namespaces that match ; otherwise, if there are no compatible namespaces found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name` 参数仅适用于预定义的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] 命名空间。The `name` parameter works only for predefined [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] namespaces. 对于在 `name` 参数中指定的任何其他命名空间 将返回 `null`，甚至是通过 构造函数的 `knownNamespaces` 参数注册的命名空间。For any other namespace given in the `name` parameter will return `null`, even those namespaces registered through the `knownNamespaces` parameter of the constructor. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的命名空间包括：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core` - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base` - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation`

span.span: XML Markup Compatibility Specification

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoredNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ IgnoredNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取加载 XML 流时被忽略的命名空间的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

value.span: 加载 XML 流时被忽略的命名空间的列表。

span.span: The list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性绝不会返回 `null`，但如果不忽略任何命名空间，则返回的列表可能为空。The property will never return `null`, however the returned list can be empty if no namespaces are ignored. 当程序读取由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]的不同版本创建的批注内容时， 有助于 XML 标记兼容性。 helps in XML markup compatibility when the program reads annotation content created by different versions of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]. 如果为较旧的应用程序提供了使用较新版本的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]创建的批注内容， 将返回较旧框架未知的元素和属性的 XML 命名空间列表。When an older application is given annotation content created using a newer version of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)], returns a list of the XML namespaces for elements and attributes not known to the older framework. 当较旧的应用程序读取并反序列化批注内容时，将忽略与较新的命名空间相关联的未知 XML 元素和属性。Unknown XML elements and attributes associated with newer namespaces are ignored when the annotation content is read and deserialized by the older application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824)上提供的*XML 标记兼容性规范*。For more information see the *XML Markup Compatibility Specification* available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824).

span.span: XML Markup Compatibility Specification

summary.span: 获取由 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的所有命名空间的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of all namespaces that are predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)].

value.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的所有命名空间的列表。

span.span: The list of namespaces that are predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] 预定义的命名空间包括：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core` - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base` - `http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation`

span.span: XML Markup Compatibility Specification
